title: Kristen Stewart: Bella of the Ball!
description: Burst onto the scene as Jodie Foster's daughter in the 2001box office hit Panic Room. With that success behind her, Stewart was cast in Cold Creek Manor, Catch that Kid, and Undertow. But in 2008 Kristen's going to break away from the pack when she fulfills every tween/teen girl's dream and plays the role of Isabella in the movie version of Stephanie Meyer's phenomenally successful Twilight. With buzz about the movie already all over the web, it's time for a bio of this rising young star.
author: Jo Hurley
